author: simonetripodi
msg: iterate over Map.Entry to hit less the input Map

author: markt
msg: Remove hack that changes path info when forwarding to an error page

author: chirino
msg: Store the original sender in the queue entry if it's not the current queue.  Allows consumers on durable subs to find out which topic the message originated from.

author: chirino
msg: All topic consumer (including durable consumers) are now proxied so that the stats are more consistent.  Durable sub updates now do not loose track of what they had previously subscribed to.  Added some tests to verify topic stats are consistent.

author: chirino
msg: Support changing the dispatch queue assigned to a connection.
